title: SDP CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to configure an SDP(typically corresponding to 
an MPLS tunnel).
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with drouter privileges, and executed 
by operators with drouter privileges.
syntax: > configure dist-router ( no sdp (sdp-id) ) | ( sdp (sdp-id) lsp-name <Drouter::MplsLspName> )

command_parameters.name: lsp-name
command_parameters.description: LSP name to set the LSP list mandatory parameter - LSP name - range: [a-zA-Z0-9-_.] - length: 1<=x<=32

raw:
help configure dist-router sdp
SDP CONFIGURATION COMMAND
=========================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure an SDP(typically corresponding to 
an MPLS tunnel).


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with drouter privileges, and executed 
by operators with drouter privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure dist-router ( no sdp (sdp-id) ) | ( sdp (sdp-id) lsp-name 
<Drouter::MplsLspName> )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "SDP Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(sdp-id)                   SDP Identifier

Table "SDP Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

lsp-name                   LSP name to set the LSP list
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Drouter::MplsLspName>
                           Format:
                           - LSP name
                           - range: [a-zA-Z0-9-_.]
                           - length: 1<=x<=32 


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
